a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Death rate from pneumonia, by age, World, 1990 to 2017
The annual number of deaths from pneumonia per 100,000 people in an age group.
Source: Global Burden of Disease Study, IHME (2018)
Note: Deaths from 'clinical pneumonia', which refers to a diagnosis based on disease symptoms such as coughing and difficulty breathing and
may include other lower respiratory diseases.
